articles.author: Priyanka Gawande
articles.title: Byju’s seeks arbitration over NCLT trial in dispute with investors | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Investors have alleged that the edtech firm has violated the tribunal’s order, which prohibited Byju's from issuing shares to participants in the rights issue without first expanding its authorized share capital
articles.content: Embattled edtech firm Byju's on Thursday filed a plea with the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) seeking arbitration in its dispute with some of its key investors. Dhyan Chinappa, representing Byj… [+6020 chars]
